includedAssets.title: Episode 1
includedAssets.synopsis: As a heartbroken Harry comes to terms with his new reality, returning soldiers cause conflict at Selfridge's.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As a heartbroken Harry comes to terms with his new reality, returning soldiers cause conflict at Selfridge's.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As a heartbroken Harry comes to terms with his new reality, returning soldiers cause conflict at Selfridge's.

includedAssets.title: Episode 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry finds his endeavours thwarted by Crabb, while Lord Loxley sees an opportunity to exact his revenge.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry finds his endeavours thwarted by Crabb, while Lord Loxley sees an opportunity to exact his revenge.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry finds his endeavours thwarted by Crabb, while Lord Loxley sees an opportunity to exact his revenge.

includedAssets.title: Episode 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry deals with the loading bay conflict, while Lord Loxley interferes in his plans to buy the land for the housing development.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry deals with the loading bay conflict, while Lord Loxley interferes in his plans to buy the land for the housing development.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry deals with the loading bay conflict, while Lord Loxley interferes in his plans to buy the land for the housing development.

includedAssets.title: Episode 4
includedAssets.synopsis: Kitty's marriage comes under pressure, while Rosalie addresses her husband's gambling debts and Agnes makes a big sacrifice for Henri.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Kitty's marriage comes under pressure, while Rosalie addresses her husband's gambling debts and Agnes makes a big sacrifice for Henri.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Kitty's marriage comes under pressure, while Rosalie addresses her husband's gambling debts and Agnes makes a big sacrifice for Henri.

includedAssets.title: Episode 5
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry pits Miss Mardle and Mr Grove against one another to be the new store deputy, while Loxley makes a plan to advance his reputation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Harry pits Miss Mardle and Mr Grove against one another to be the new store deputy, while Loxley makes a plan to advance his reputation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry pits Miss Mardle and Mr Grove against one another to be the new store deputy, while Loxley makes a plan to advance his reputation.

includedAssets.title: Episode 6
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry makes a sacrifice to raise money for the estate, while a frustrated Mr Grove allows Gordon to make an embarrassing mistake.

includedAssets.title: Episode 7
includedAssets.synopsis: As Lord Loxley continues to increase his influence over Selfridge's, Harry grows closer to Nancy Webb.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Lord Loxley continues to increase his influence over Selfridge's, Harry grows closer to Nancy Webb.

includedAssets.title: Episode 8
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry plans a grand event in the hope of using the signing of the Treaty of Versailles to promote the store.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Harry plans a grand event in the hope of using the signing of the Treaty of Versailles to promote the store.

includedAssets.title: Episode 9
includedAssets.synopsis: As Lord Loxley attempts to take advantage of the store's bad publicity, Harry tries to increase profits with a massive sale.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Lord Loxley attempts to take advantage of the store's bad publicity, Harry tries to increase profits with a massive sale.

includedAssets.title: Episode 10
includedAssets.synopsis: Harry struggles with his personal life as the threat of losing control of the store looms. Series finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: A heartbroken Harry is forced to fight off a vengeful Loxley and deal with his returning male workforce in this third series of the period drama starring Jeremy Piven.

includedIn.title: Mr. Selfridge
includedIn.synopsis: Harry Selfridge decides to build the world's biggest and best department store on London's Oxford Street. Early 20th century period drama.
